General.Name: Jiangsu Zeyu Intelligent Power Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Zeyu Intelligent Power Co.,Ltd. engages in provision of engineering construction, operation and maintenance, system integration, and design and consulting services for the power industry in China. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Nantong, China.

4.Name: Mr. Yang Tian  Chen
